Garden Edging Mt Eliza

We are the local landscape edging experts for Mt Eliza. Create timeless, rusty garden borders that withstand the Mt Eliza coastal salt air.

Get a Mt Eliza Quote

Why Mt Eliza Gardens Need Corten

Owning property in Mt Eliza means dealing with sandy soils and salt exposure. Timber rots and plastic cracks. Corten steel is the only edging material that improves with age in our coastal climate.

We realize many Mt Eliza properties feature native coastal plantings. The rustic orange of Corten steel provides the perfect backdrop for these green-grey palettes.

  • Delivered to Mt Eliza Weekly
  • Installation Network in Mt Eliza area
  • Suitable for Mt Eliza Soil Conditions
